item.title: Herblore.java help
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

What i got so farâ€¦

[code]
public class Herblore {
public static int oldHerb[] { 199, 200, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 207,
208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215,
216, 217, 218, 219, 220 };

piblic static int newHerb[] { 249, 251, 253, 255, 257, 259, 261, 263, 265,
				 267, 269 };

public int herbClicked (Client client, int oldHerb, int newHerb) {
	if (client.checkBusy()) {
		return true;
	}

		client.getActionAssistant().deleteItem(oldHerb);
		client.getActionAssistant().addItem(newHerb);
		client.getActionAssistant().addSkillXP(100, SkillConstants.HERBLORE);
		client.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("You identify the herb.");
	} else {
		client.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("You do not have a high enough herblore
			 	level to do this.");
	}
	return true;
	}
}

public void cleanHerb() {
	herbClicked(WHATDOIPUTHERE?, 199, 249); //guam
}

} [/code]

Ok first off what do i put in herbClicked method?
Do you think this code is going to work?

Read full topic
